metadata.description: Join visionary writer Grant Morrison and a cast of unforgettable characters from 52 alternative Earths of the known DC Multiverse for an adventure to save the all of reality! Comprising six complete adventures—each set in a different parallel universe—plus a two-part framing story and a comprehensive guidebook, THE MULTIVERSITY is more than just a multipart comic-book series, it’s an experience!
metadata.name: The Multiversity
